details: - Worked as Team Leader for the Academy Website Project:
Led a team to successfully deliver the complete academy website project.
Conducted project analysis, assigned tasks, and set clear timelines.
Monitored daily progress, resolved obstacles, and ensured smooth collaboration.
Consolidated team contributions into the final project and provided feedback for future improvement.
- Worked as a Front-End Web Developer:
Converted a project from Pure CSS to Tailwind CSS, improving scalability and development speed.
Evaluated user interfaces and proposed enhancements to optimize user experience.
Applied best practices in UI/UX design through real-world case studies.
Collaborated on an e-commerce project using Git for version control and teamwork.
